autoElevated.description: If *true*, the permissions of the account are automatically elevated to the root user.

addToSudoers.description: If *true*, the account is automatically added to the sudoers file.

useSu.description: If *true*, the `su` command is used for Linux distributions where the `sudo` command is not available.

passphrase.description: Passphrase that protects the private key.
Passphrase that protects the private key.

isHighPriority.description: If *true*, the job has a high priority in getting backup infrastructure resources.

tag.description: Tag assigned to the backup repository.

automaticSelection.description: If *true*, backup proxies are detected and assigned automatically.

tag.description: Tag assigned to the backup proxy.

isEnabled.description: If *true*, application-aware processing is enabled.

appSettings.description: Array of VMware objects and their application settings.

usePersistentGuestAgent.description: If *true*, persistent guest agent is used.

BackupSQLSettingsImportModel.description: Microsoft SQL Server transaction log settings.

backupMinsCount.description: Frequency of transaction log backup, in minutes.

keepDaysCount.description: Number of days to keep transaction logs in the backup repository.

BackupLogShippingServersImportModel.description: Log shipping server used to transport logs.

autoSelection.description: If *true*, Veeam Backup & Replication chooses an optimal log shipping server automatically.

shippingServerNames.description: Array of servers that are explicitly selected for log shipping.

useGuestCredentials.description: If *true*, Veeam Backup & Replication uses credentials specified in the guest processing settings.

deleteHoursCount.description: Time period in hours to keep archived logs. This parameter should be specified if the `EBackupOracleLogsSettings` value is *deleteExpiredHours*.

deleteGBsCount.description: Maximum size for archived logs in GB. This parameter should be specified if the `EBackupOracleLogsSettings` value is *deleteExpiredGBs*.

backupLogs.description: If *true*, archived logs are backed up.

backupMinsCount.description: Frequency of archived log backup, in minutes.

keepDaysCount.description: Number of days to keep archived logs.

credentialsName.description: User name, account name or access key.

credentialsTag.description: Tag used to identify the credentials record.

GuestInteractionProxiesSettingsImportMod.description: Guest interaction proxy used to deploy the runtime process on the VM guest OS.

automaticSelection.description: If *true*, Veeam Backup & Replication automatically selects the guest interaction proxy.

proxies.description: Array of proxies specified explicitly. The array must contain Microsoft Windows servers added to the backup infrastructure only.

names.description: Array of job names. Wildcard characters are supported.

skip.description: Number of VMware vSphere servers to skip.

limit.description: Maximum number of VMware vSphere servers to return.

orderAsc.description: Sorts VMware vSphere servers in the ascending order by the `orderColumn` parameter.

nameFilter.description: Filters VMware vSphere servers by the `nameFilter` pattern. The pattern can match any VMware vSphere server parameter. To substitute one or more characters, use the asterisk (*) character at the beginning and/or at the end.

EViRootFiltersOrderColumn.description: Sorts VMware vSphere servers by one of the VMware vSphere server parameters.

limit.description: Maximum number of objects to return.

orderAsc.description: Sorts objects in the ascending order by the `orderColumn` parameter.

nameFilter.description: Filters objects by the `nameFilter` pattern. The pattern can match any object parameter. To substitute one or more characters, use the asterisk (*) character at the beginning and/or at the end.

parentContainerNameFilter.description: Filters objects by name of the parent container.

EvCentersInventoryFiltersOrderColumn.description: Sorts vCenter Servers by one of the job parameters.

tag.description: Tag used to identify the credentials record.

SSHPort.description: SSH port used to connect to a Linux server.

autoElevated.description: If *true*, the permissions of the account are automatically elevated to the root user.

addToSudoers.description: If *true*, the account is automatically added to the sudoers file.

useSu.description: If *true*, the `su` command is used for Linux distributions where the `sudo` command is not available.

passphrase.description: Passphrase that protects the private key.

names.description: Array of credentials user names. Wildcard characters are supported.
Array of backup proxy names. Wildcard characters are supported.

ProxyServerSettingsImportSpec.description: Settings of the server that is used as a backup proxy.

hostToProxyEncryption.description: [For the Network mode] If *true*, VM data is transferred over an encrypted TLS connection.

names.description: Array of server names. Wildcard characters are supported.

windowsHosts.description: Array of managed Microsoft Windows servers.

name.description: Full DNS name or IP address of the server.
Full DNS name or IP address of the server.

sshFingerprint.description: SSH key fingerprint used to verify the server identity.

name.description: Full DNS name or IP address of the server.

port.description: Port used to communicate with the server.

certificateThumbprint.description: [Optional] Certificate thumbprint used to verify the server identity.

names.description: Array of repository names. Wildcard characters are supported.

tag.description: VMware vSphere tag assigned to the backup repository.

hostName.description: ID of the server that is used as a backup repository.

tag.description: VMware vSphere tag assigned to the backup repository.

hostName.description: ID of the server that is used as a backup repository.

writeCacheFolder.description: Path to the folder used for writing cache during mount operations.

vPowerNFSEnabled.description: If *true*, the vPower NFS Service is enabled on the mount server.

tag.description: VMware vSphere tag assigned to the backup repository.
VMware vSphere tag assigned to the backup repository.

sharePath.description: Path to the shared folder that that is used as a backup repository.
Path to the shared folder that that is used as a backup repository.

autoSelect.description: If *true*, Veeam Backup & Replication automatically selects a gateway server.

password.description: Password for data encryption. If you lose the password, you will not be able to restore it.

hint.description: Hint for the encryption password. Provide a meaningful hint that will help you recall the password.

modificationTime.description: Date and time the password was last modified.

modificationTimeFrom.description: Date and time the password was last modified.

tags.description: Array of password tags.

jobId.description: ID of the job that created the backup.

name.description: Name of the job that created the backup.

platformId.description: ID of the platform of the backup resource.

creationTime.description: Date and time when the backup was created.

repositoryId.description: ID of the backup repository where the backup is stored.

platformId.description: Id of the platform where the object was created.

objectId.description: ID of the virtual infrastructure object: mo-ref or ID, depending on the virtualization platform.

platformId.description: ID of a platform on which the object was created.

creationTime.description: Date and time when the restore point was created.

backupId.description: ID of a backup that contains the restore point.

allowedOperations.description: Array of operations allowed for the restore point.

disksMapping.description: Array of disks that will be restored.

sessionId.description: ID of the restore session. Use the ID to track the progress. For details, see [Get Session](#operation/GetSession).

nameInBackup.description: Disk name displayed in the backup.

mountedDiskName.description: Name of the VMDK file that will be stored in the datastore.

registeredFcdName.description: Name under which the disk will be registered as an FCD in the vCenter Managed Object Browser.

nameInBackup.description: Disk name displayed in the backup.

mountedDiskName.description: Name of the VMDK file that is stored in the datastore.

registeredFcdName.description: Name under which the disk is registered as an FCD in the vCenter Managed Object Browser.

redirectIsEnabled.description: If *true*, cache redirection is enabled. In this case, all changes made to the recovered disks while the Instant FCD Recovery is active are redirected to the specified `cacheDatastore` associated with the `storagePolicy`.

id.description: ID of the scale-out backup repository.

name.description: Name of the scale-out backup repository.

description.description: Description of the scale-out backup repository.

tag.description: Tag assigned to of the scale-out backup repository.

id.description: ID of the backup repository added as a performance extent.

name.description: Name of the backup repository added as a performance extent.

PerformanceTierAdvancedSettingsModel.description: Advanced settings of the performance tier.

perVmBackup.description: If *true*, Veeam Backup & Replication creates a separate backup file for every VM in the job.

fullWhenExtentOffline.description: If *true*, Veeam Backup & Replication creates a full backup file instead of an incremental backup file in case the required extent is offline.

BackupPlacementSettingsModel.description: Settings of the performance placement policy.

EAllowedBackupsType.description: Type of backup files that can be stored on the extent.

enabled.description: If *true*, the capacity tier is enabled.

extentId.description: ID of an object storage repository added as a capacity extent.

copyPolicyEnabled.description: If *true*, Veeam Backup & Replication copies backups from the performance extents to the capacity extent as soon as the backups are created.

movePolicyEnabled.description: If *true*, Veeam Backup & Replication moves backup files that belong to inactive backup chains from the performance extents to the capacity extent.

operationalRestorePeriodDays.description: Number of days after which inactive backup chains on the performance extents are moved to the capacity extent. Specify *0* to offload inactive backup chains on the same day they are created.

isEnabled.description: If *true*, Veeam Backup & Replication moves oldest backup files sooner if scale-out backup repository is reaching the threshold.

overrideSpaceThresholdPercents.description: Space threshold of the scale-out backup repository, in percent.

isEnabled.description: If *true*, the archive tier is enabled.

extentId.description: ID of an object storage repository added as an archive extent.

archivePeriodDays.description: Number of days after which backup chains on the capacity extent are moved to the archive extent. Specify *0* to offload inactive backup chains on the same day they are created.

ArchiveTierAdvancedSettingsModel.description: Advanced settings of the archive tier.

costOptimizedArchiveEnabled.description: If *true*, backups are archived if the remaining retention time is above minimum storage period for the repository.

archiveDeduplicationEnabled.description: If *true*, each backup is stored as a delta to the previous one.

limit.description: Maximum number of repositories to return.

orderAsc.description: Sorts repositories in the ascending order by the `orderColumn` parameter.

nameFilter.description: Filters repositories by the `nameFilter` substring. The substring can be part of any repository parameter.

mountedDiskNames.description: Array of disks that will be migrated to the `targetDatastore` associated with the `storagePolicy`.

targetDatastore.description: Target datastore. For details on how to get a datastore model, see [Get VMware vSphere Server Objects](#operation/GetVmwareHostObject).

storagePolicy.description: Storage policy that will be applied to the migrated disks. For details on how to get a storage policy model, see [Get VMware vSphere Server Objects](#operation/GetVmwareHostObject).

hostId.description: ID of the server that is used as a backup repository.

hostName.description: Name of the server that is used as a backup repository.

path.description: Path to the folder where backup files are stored.

RepositoryStatesFilters.description: Filters repositories by the specified parameters.

skip.description: Skips the specified number of repositories.

limit.description: Returns the specified number of repositories.

orderAsc.description: Sorts repositories in the ascending order by the `orderColumn` parameter.

nameFilter.description: Filters repositories by the `nameFilter` pattern. The pattern can match any repository parameter. To substitute one or more characters, use the asterisk (*) character at the beginning and/or at the end.

freeSpaceFilter.description: Filters repositories by repository free space.

usedSpaceFilter.description: Filters repositories by repository used space.

ERepositoryStatesFiltersOrderColumn.description: Orders repositories by the specified column.

port.description: Port used to communicate with the service.

isEnabled.description: If *true*, global email notification settings are enabled.

smtpServerName.description: Full DNS name or IP address of the SMTP server.

from.description: Email address from which email notifications must be sent.

to.description: Recipient email addresses. Use a semicolon to separate multiple addresses.

subject.description:
Notification subject. Use the following variables in the subject:
  1. %Time% — completion time
  2. %JobName%
  3. %JobResult%
  4. %ObjectCount% — number of VMs in the job
  5. %Issues% — number of VMs in the job that have been processed with the Warning or Failed status

sendDailyReportsAt.description: Time when Veeam Backup & Replication sends daily email reports.

notifyOnSuccess.description: If *true*, email notifications are sent when the job completes successfully.

notifyOnWarning.description: If *true*, email notifications are sent when the job completes with a warning.

notifyOnFailure.description: If *true*, email notifications are sent when the job fails.

notifyOnLastRetry.description: If *true*, email notifications are sent about the final job status only (not per every job retry).

port.description: Port number for the SMTP server.

timeoutMs.description: Connection timeout for the SMTP server.

SSLEnabled.description: If *true*, secure connection for email operations is used.

authRequred.description: If *true*, the `credentialsId` credentials are used to connect to the SMTP server.

credentialsId.description: ID of the credentials used to connect to the server.

storageSpaceThresholdEnabled.description: If *true*, notifications about critical amount of free space in backup storage are enabled.

storageSpaceThreshold.description: Space threshold of backup storage, in percent.

datastoreSpaceThresholdEnabled.description: If *true*, notifications about critical amount of free space in production datastore are enabled.

datastoreSpaceThreshold.description: Space threshold of production datastore, in percent.

skipVMSpaceThresholdEnabled.description: If *true* and the `skipVMSpaceThreshold` threshold is reached, Veeam Backup & Replication terminates backup and replication jobs working with production datastores before VM snapshots are taken.

skipVMSpaceThreshold.description: Space threshold of production datastore, in percent.

notifyOnSupportExpiration.description: If *true*, notifications about support contract expiration are enabled.

notifyOnUpdates.description: If *true*, notifications about updates are enabled.

isEnabled.description: If *true*, configuration backup is enabled.

backupRepositoryId.description: ID of the backup repository on which the configuration backup is stored.

restorePointsToKeep.description: Number of restore points to keep in the backup repository.

SNMPEnabled.description: If *true*, SNMP traps are enabled for this job.

isEnabled.description: If *true*, email notifications are enabled for this job.

subject.description: Notification subject. Use the following variables in the subject: *%JobResult%*, *%JobName%*, *%Time%* (completion time).

notifyOnSuccess.description: If *true*, email notifications are sent when the job completes successfully.

notifyOnWarning.description: If *true*, email notifications are sent when the job completes with a warning.

notifyOnError.description: If *true*, email notifications are sent when the job fails.

lastSuccessfulTime.description: Date and time when the last successful backup was created.

isEnabled.description: If *true*, backup scheduling is enabled.
If *true*, backup encryption is enabled.

passwordId.description: ID of the password used for encryption.

fingerprint.description: SSH key fingerprint used to verify the server identity.

apiVersionParam.name: x-api-version
apiVersionParam.description:
Version and revision of the client REST API. Must be in the following
format: *\<version\>-\<revision\>*.

Bearer.description: Access token in the *Bearer \<access token\>* format.
Bearer.name: Authorization
